channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov for The Times, 10–11 April 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 9–14 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 19–27 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 2–5 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4–5 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 8–14 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1–6 seats
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 8–15 seats
  • Change UK (EPP): 0–4 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov for The Times, 10–11 April 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by YouGov for The Times, 10–11 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 14.6–17.9%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 22.3–26.3%
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 6.9–9.4%
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 4.1–6.2%
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 0.7–1.6%
  • UK Independence Party (EAPN): 12.6–15.8%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.9–9.4%
  • Brexit Party (EFDD): 13.6–16.9%
  • Change UK (EPP): 6.0–8.3%

  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.9–9.3%
